feature_model.name: VOD feature model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r VODPlayer(_r) :m StartPlayer(_r_1) :m SelectMovie(_r_2) :o ChangeServer(_r_2_9) :o Detail(_r_2_10) :m StartMovie(_r_3) :o StopMovie(_r_3_8) :m VCRInterface(_r_4) :m PlayImm(_r_5) :o Quit(_r_6) :o Pause(_r_7)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:_r_3 or ~_r_7 constraint_2:_r_2 or ~_r_2_9 or ~_r_2_10 constraint_3:_r_3 or ~_r_3_8
